text:

West Hotel is located at Ninh Kieu quay, center of Can Tho city. 80 well-equipped and state-of-the-art rooms conforming to international 4 star standard, together with the professional and dedicated staff, are promised to bring you the most comfortable stay in Can Tho. It deals with an ancient house in Binh Thuy. The owner is respected Mr. Duong Minh Hien, an old sentimental man, by chance, remaining in the XX century. It is just thanks to its maintained ancientness that this house was chosen as one of recording sites for the romantic film "Lover" of producer J. Annaud. Dining facilities at West Hotel include a restaurant. The hotel boasts a 24-hour front desk service. Other services:concierge services, dry cleaning/laundry service, elevator/lift, laundry facilities, porter/bellhop, tours/ticket assistance and wedding services. 
The construction was started in 1870 on an area of approximately eight thousand square meters. According to the respected Mr. Duong's stories, his grandfather was named Duong Chan Ky, whose souvenir is a portrayed picture, now solemnly hanging just in the middle room. An originality of the picture is that it was made in enameled terra-cotta with details as veritable as that of present photographs. It is said that such a technique of making pictures was known only in France and China since the end of the 18th century. At West Hotel, you will enjoy not only the best services, ranging from coffee-bar, swimming pool, massage, to restaurant but the natural beauty of Hau river. Besides, the hotel is an ideal place for conferences, meetings, events and parties with the venuesâ€™ capacity up to 150 persons, mordern sound - light system, and large space. 
Nestled in the heart of Ninh Kieu Quay, Nam Bo Boutique Hotel is an ideal spot from which to discover Can Tho. The excitement of the city center is only 0.2 Km away. This modern hotel is in the vicinity of popular city attractions such as Ong Pagoda, Ho Chi Minh Museum, Ninh Kieu Wharf. 
Nam Bo Boutique Hotel offers impeccable service and all the essential amenities to invigorate travelers. For the comfort and convenience of guests, the hotel offers smoking area, bar, airport transfer, coffee shop, tours. 
Guests can choose from 7 rooms, all of which exude an atmosphere of total peace and harmony. Besides, the hotel's host of recreational offerings ensures you have plenty to do during your stay. Whatever your reason for visiting Can Tho, the Nam Bo Boutique Hotel is the perfect venue for an exhilarating and exciting break away. Source: Free Articles from ArticlesFactory.com ABOUT THE AUTHOR
